repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:8 
RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y curl bzip2 libfreetype6 libfontconfig && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY ./scripts/ /opt/app 
WORKDIR /opt/app 

RUN yarn 

ENV PATH=/opt/app/node_modules/phantomjs-prebuilt/lib/phantom/bin:$PATH 

CMD ["node", "index.js"]
